title: About 333000 children were abused within France's Catholic Church, a report finds
content:
1. About 333000 children were abused within France's Catholic Church, a report finds  NPR
  2. More than 200,000 children sexually abused by French Catholic clergy, damning report finds  CNN
  3. A year after 'Fratelli Tutti,' it's time the church move from dreaming to doing  National Catholic Reporter
  4. Brooklyn bishop, cleared of abuse claims, retires  AP Archive
  5. More than 200,000 children sexually abused by French Catholic clergy, landmark report finds  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: フランスのカトリック教会では、約33万3000人の子どもたちが虐待を受けていたことが明らかになりました。
报告指出，约有33.3万名儿童在法国天主教会内受到虐待
報告指出，約有33.3萬名兒童在法國天主教會內受到虐待
